help.overview: Allows a bot admin to administrate users via irc
help.command:
useradmin [add|remove|hostmasks|addhostmask|delhostmask|password|addop|delop] username [hostmask|password|channel]
add - adds a user
remove - removes a user
hostmasks - lists a user's hostmasks
addhostmask - adds a hostmasks to a user's list of hostmasks
delhostmask - removes a hostmask from a user's list of hostmasks
password - changes a user's password
addop - adds a user as an op for a channel
